page.title: 08Sunday League Football
page.content: {The Sunday League}was founded by{Jim {Lowe}in{1983}.The teams that play are: {Marpool Pacers,Brixington Blues, {Withycombe TSB, Littleham Krona and {Lympstone Lions}.The league consists of three age groups, under 11's, under 13's and under 15's.The league is shown in the Exmouth Herald each week. Marpool Pacers are managed by Alan Cain and last year were managed by Tim Smith. In the last season Marpool won only one game against Lympstone Lions, the score was 2-1 to Marpool. Brixington Blues won the league. Sunday league was mainly made for boys who had nothing to do on Sundays. We give our thanks to Jim Lowe.
